name: Find The Block - Game Maker
description:
Instructions

- Use The Mouse To Place Objects.

- Press Z To Go Through The Different Objects And Press X To Go Back.

- Press C To Use The Eraser And Press C Again To Stop.

- Press S To Move The Start To Where You Want.

- Press F To Move The Checkpoint To Where You Want.
- Press G To Move The Goal To Where You Want.
- Press P To Play/Make Your Game.
- Press O To Switch From Keyboard Controls (<>^v) To Mouse Controls (Click To Move To Cursor).
- Click On Clear To Clear Your Game.
- Press Space While Playing To Slow Down Your Character.
- Triangles Get Rid Of The Corresponding Colored Block.
- The Red & Blue Block (Switch) Switches Between The Red Block With A Blue Square Or A Blue Block With A Red Square.
- Orange Is Death.
- Coins Are Coins.
- Black Is A Wall.

Other

Have Fun!
